description: Displays metrics from the Kitten Analysts backend.

panels.description: How many times the game has been reset.
panels.title: Resets

panels.description: Current paragon count
panels.title: Paragon

panels.description: Current epiphany amount
panels.title: Epiphany

panels.description: How many unicorns have been sacrificed so far?
panels.title: Unicorns Sacrificed

panels.description: Current transcendence tier
panels.title: Transcendence Tier

panels.description: Current energy level of the leviathans.
panels.title: Leviathans Energy

panels.description: How many kittens are currently alive.
panels.title: Kittens

panels.description: How many paragons you currently have.
panels.title: Paragon

panels.description: How much worhsip have you already accumulated?
panels.title: Worship

panels.description: How much epiphany have you already accumulated?
panels.title: Epiphany

panels.description: How much unobtainium is currently in stock.
panels.title: Unobtainium

panels.description: How much antimatter  is currently in stock.
panels.title: Antimatter

panels.description: How many time crystals are currently in stock?
panels.title: Time Crystals

panels.description: How many relics are currently in stock?
panels.title: Relics

panels.description: How much void is currently in stock?
panels.title: Void

panels.description: How many blackcoins are currently in stock?
panels.title: Blackcoin

panels.description: Current pollution level on Cath.
panels.title: Pollution

panels.description: Buildings on the Bonfire tab.
panels.title: Bonfire

panels.description: Buildings on the Religion tab.

targets.expr: kg_building_value{tab="Religion", group="ziggurats", instance=~"$instance", location=~"$location", client_type=~"$client_type", guid=~"$guid"}

panels.title: Religion: Ziggurats

panels.description: Buildings on the Religion tab.

targets.expr: kg_building_value{tab="Religion", group="orderOfTheSun", instance=~"$instance", location=~"$location", client_type=~"$client_type", guid=~"$guid"}

panels.title: Religion: Order of the Sun

panels.description: Buildings on the Religion tab.

targets.expr: kg_building_value{tab="Religion", group="cryptotheology", instance=~"$instance", location=~"$location", client_type=~"$client_type", guid=~"$guid"}

panels.title: Religion: Cryptotheology

panels.description: Buildings on the Space tab.
panels.title: Space

panels.description: Buildings on the Time tab.
panels.title: Time

panels.description: Current value of blackcoin.
panels.title: Blackcoin Price

panels.description: Current energy level of leviathans.
panels.title: Leviathan Energy

panels.description: Shows how much pollution each building produces.
panels.title: Pollution Production

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.99, avg by(le, manager) (rate(ks_iterate_duration_bucket{manager!="all", instance=~"$instance", location=~"$location", client_type=~"$client_type", guid=~"$guid"}[$__rate_interval])))

list.description: The Kitten Analysts exporter instance to show data from.
list.label: Instance
list.name: instance

list.description: The type of client connected to the analytics backend.
list.label: Client Type
list.name: client_type

title: Kitten Science
